message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. My initial offer for the product is $1200000.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can you consider my offer?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $1100000.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $1050000. Can you consider this offer?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. My counteroffer for the product is now $1075000.
I'm getting close to my target price, Alice. I'll offer $1040000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Considering your last offer, Bob, I am willing to sell the product for $1062500.

I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm not going to go any higher. I'll offer $1050000. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Understood, Bob. Let's try to find common ground. My counteroffer for the product is now $1056250.

I'm not willing to go any higher, Alice. I'm going to have to walk away if we can't come to an agreement. I'll offer $1050000 one last time. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John.
